example.code: PS C:\> Add-ELBTags -LoadBalancerName my-load-balancer -Tag @{ Key="project";Value="lima" },@{ Key="department";Value="digital-media" }
example.description: This example adds the specified tags to the specified load balancer. The syntax used by this example requires PowerShell version 3 or later.

example.code: PS C:\> $tag = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancing.Model.Tag PS C:\> $tag.Key = "project" PS C:\> $tag.Value = "lima" PS C:\> Add-ELBTags -LoadBalancerName my-load-balancer -Tag $tag
example.description: With PowerShell version 2, you must use New-Object to create a tag for the Tag parameter.
